title: Early access
description: Get early access to new tools, guides, and features as we build them.

whatWereBuilding.title: What we're building
whatWereBuilding.intro: We're slowly expanding IkiGlow with more resources for self-awareness, focus, and intentional living.
whatWereBuilding.item3: • More exercises for calm and focus
whatWereBuilding.item4: • Deeper guides on mental patterns and growth
whatWereBuilding.outro: No timelines. No pressure. Just quiet, steady progress.

form.disclaimer: We'll email you when something new is ready. No spam. You can opt out anytime.

whatToExpect.title: What to expect
whatToExpect.line1: You'll receive an email when we release something meaningful - not every small update.
whatToExpect.line2: You'll get early access to test new features and share feedback if you want to.
whatToExpect.line3: You won't receive marketing emails, growth hacks, or urgency-driven messages. Just calm updates.
